modules.title: Arrays and Linked Lists
modules.description: Implementing and using arrays and linked lists in C++.

steps.content: Arrays store elements in contiguous memory. Linked lists use nodes with pointers. Learn their implementation and trade-offs.

steps.question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array?
Write a C++ struct for a singly linked list node.

steps.content: Sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort, Quick Sort, and Merge Sort are essential. Learn their implementation in C++.
